mapper.select: SELECT customerCode ,comCode ,customerNumber ,customerCeo ,customerName ,customerAddress ,customerPhone ,customerCreditNumber ,customerContactNumber ,customerCategory ,customerRemarks FROM cfcustomer WHERE comCode=#{comCode};
SELECT comAuthorityApproval FROM cfcomauthority WHERE memberEmail=#{memberEmail} AND comCode=#{comCode}

SELECT comCode ,comName ,comRegistrationNumber ,comWebPage ,comCeoName ,comInfo ,comLogoName ,comLogoOriginalName ,comIntroduction ,comPhone ,memberEmail ,comRegistrationRequestDay ,managerApproval ,managerApprovalDay ,managerApprovalEmail ,comIndustry ,comCondition FROM cfcombaseinfo WHERE comCode=#{comCode};
SELECT comCode , comName , comCeoName , comRegistrationNumber , comInfo , comAddress , comPhone , comIndustry FROM cfcombaseinfo WHERE managerApproval = 1 ORDER BY comName ASC

SELECT comCode , comName , comRegistrationNumber , comWebPage , comCeoName , comInfo , comIntroduction , comAddress , comPhone , memberEmail , comRegistrationRequestDay , managerApproval , managerApprovalDay , managerApprovalEmail , comIndustry ,comCondition FROM cfcombaseinfo WHERE managerApproval = 0 ORDER BY comName ASC
